nodes.text: An alien patron of the Canto Casino in the coastal city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica brought a pet Sheffi to the casino in the year 34 ABY.

The patron was portrayed by creature performer Paul Warren in the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, the second installment of the Star Wars sequel trilogy. Warren has referred to the character as the "dowager alien" on his Twitter account and had hinted that some scenes featuring the character that were cut from the film will appear on the Blu-ray release.

According to Nick Kellington, he was originally considered to play the patron along Warren during the Canto Casino sequence, but ultimately he was given the character of Snook Uccorfay and Warren performed the patron himself.
